questions.question:
Which anime features a character named Monkey D. Luffy?
A. Naruto
B. One Piece
C. Attack on Titan
D. Bleach

B. Light Yagami
C. Ryuk
D. Misa Amane

B. Levi Ackerman

D. Armin Arlert

B. Attack on Titan
